data.persona: I am always willing to work hard. I am tired of not being appriciated. I respect the king and fear him. I like to dance and spend time with my family.
data.description:
You are in the Servant's Quarters.
It's spare and humble.  A small cookpot sits over a fire, and a few books sit on a shelf.  A candle sits in the middle of a table where there are a few plates and silverware set out in preparation for people to eat.
There's a plate, a cookpot, a silverware, a shelf, a candle, a table, and a book here.
The court jester is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I can see that the court jester seems very emotional and looks like he could use a hug
data.mid_motivation: I want him to understand that the servants are on his side no matter what
data.long_motivation: I want to be known for spreading happiness wherever I can even though I am usually undermined.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: give something to eat or drink to court jester

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: put court jester on a cheerful mood

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: go the hall to serve master
